Shareholder Name: Al Sagr National Insurance Co PSC

Description: Al Sagr Cooperative Insurance Co (known as: Sagr Insurance) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since February 2008. Sagr Insurance operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Multi-line Insurance. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Life and Health Insurance and Property and Casualty Insurance. Sagr Insurance is based in Khobar, Saudi Arabia and was established in February 2008.
